alert.note: Alert for Lenawee; Monroe (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 03 at 9:20PM EST by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...VERY HAZARDOUS TRAVEL CONDITIONS THROUGH MIDNIGHT... WEATHER... * Moderate to briefly heavy snow will continue across Monroe and Lenawee counties through midnight. * Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches will be possible. * Hourly snowfall rates up to 1 inch per hour will be possible. * Northeast wind gusts up to 35 mph will be possible resulting in visibilities below 1/2 mile at times. IMPACTS... * Very hazardous travel is likely. Accumulating snow will continue to lead to slippery roadways, particularly on bridges, exit ramps, and overpasses. && PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... * Very hazardous travel is likely. Accumulating snow will continue to lead to slippery roadways, particularly on bridges, exit ramps, and overpasses. * Prepare, plan and stay informed. Visit http://go.usa.gov/c7kkP
